meaning list.sentence: The voting process will close at 6 p.m.
meaning list.sentence translation: Vote ni ayeke hunzi ande na ngbonga 18:00.

meaning list.sentence: We wandered through the streets of the old town.
meaning list.sentence translation: E yeke tambela na yâ ti alege ti ngbene gbata ni.

meaning list.sentence: Global warming is a serious environmental issue.
meaning list.sentence translation: Chauffage ti sese ayeke mbeni kota kpale so angoro e.

meaning list.sentence: She writes a weekly column for the local newspaper.
meaning list.sentence translation: Lo yeke sû mbeni mbeti yenga oko oko na yâ ti mbeti-sango ti kodoro ni.

meaning list.meaning: ye ti dongo bê, ye ti dongo bê (adjectif)
meaning list.sentence: He had a weird dream about flying last night.
meaning list.sentence translation: Na bï ni so, lo bâ mbeni ye ti dongo bê na ndo ti voyage ti avion.

meaning list.sentence: The government is focused on improving public welfare.
meaning list.sentence translation: Letäa ayeke zia lê ti lo gi na ndo ti lekengo nzoni duti ti azo.

meaning list.sentence: The fields are full of golden wheat ready for harvest.
meaning list.sentence translation: Ayaka ni asi singo na blé ti lor so alingbi awe ti tene a ko ni.

meaning list.sentence: Whoever arrives first gets the best seat.
meaning list.sentence translation: Zo so aga kozo, lo yeke wara nzoni ndo ti duti.

meaning list.sentence: The disease is widespread in rural areas.
meaning list.sentence translation: Kobela ni ayeke mingi na yâ ti akete kodoro.

meaning list.sentence: The book is filled with wisdom and practical advice.
meaning list.sentence translation: Mbeti ni asi singo na ndara nga na anzoni wango.

meaning list.sentence: She decided to withdraw her application for the job.
meaning list.sentence translation: Lo mû desizion ti zi demande ti lo ti wara kua ni.

meaning list.sentence: The company is planning to expand its workforce next year.
meaning list.sentence translation: Kompani ni aleke ti kono wungo ti azo so ayeke sara kua na yâ ti ngu so ayeke ga.

meaning list.sentence: Safety measures are important in the workplace.
meaning list.sentence translation: A yeke kota ye ti tene zo asara hange na ndo ti kua.

meaning list.sentence: The artist holds a workshop every Saturday.
meaning list.sentence translation: Azo ti lekengo ye ni ayeke leke mbeni atelier na samedi oko oko.

meaning list.sentence: The gardener found a worm in the soil.
meaning list.sentence translation: Zo ti sarango yaka ni awara mbeni ngbo na yâ ti sese ni.

meaning list.sentence: She wears a bracelet on her left wrist.
meaning list.sentence translation: Lo yü mbeni bracelet na maboko ti lo ti koli.
